description: Detects execution of Microsoft Defender's CLI process (MpCmdRun.exe) from the non-default directory which may be an attempt to sideload arbitary DLL
name: DLL Sideloading by Microsoft Defender
query: (process.executable.text:*\\MpCmdRun.exe AND (NOT (process.executable.text:(C\:\\Program\ Files\\Windows\ Defender\\* OR C\:\\ProgramData\\Microsoft\\Windows\ Defender\\Platform\\* OR C\:\\Windows\\winsxs\\x86_security\-malware\-windows\-defender_* OR C\:\\Program\ Files\\Microsoft\ Security\ Client\\MpCmdRun.exe*))))
author: Bhabesh Raj
